joinUs.heading: Join the Crew
joinUs.description: Ready to embark on an exciting journey into the cosmos? Join DHS Aerospace and be part of the next generation of space explorers!

aboutUs.heading: Who are we?
aboutUs.description: Dublin High School Aerospace is a club dedicated to pushing the boundaries of plane and rocket discovery and innovation. Our mission is to inspire and educate the next generation of aerospace engineers and scientists, fostering a passion for discovery and technological advancement.

ambitions.title: Competitions
ambitions.description: Reaching new heights in national and international rocketry competitions

ambitions.title: Connections
ambitions.description: Gaining industry-level experience and making lifelong friendships

ambitions.title: Community
ambitions.description: Educating local students and residents about aerospace technologies

aboutUs.comment: When changing Icons under ambitions, make sure to import the Icon from Lucide-react and add it here below (in the {} brackets)

events.title: Rocket Launch Simulation
events.description: Join us for an exciting virtual rocket launch simulation. Learn about the intricacies of space flight and rocket engineering.

events.title: Guest Lecture: The Future of Space Exploration
events.description: Renowned astronaut Dr. Jane Smith will discuss the future of space exploration and the role of young engineers in shaping it.

events.title: Aerospace Engineering Workshop
events.description: A hands-on workshop covering the basics of aerospace engineering. Participants will design and build small-scale aircraft models.

events.title: Aerospace Engineering Workshop
events.description: A hands-on workshop covering the basics of aerospace engineering. Participants will design and build small-scale aircraft models.

courseSections.title: Rocket Engineering 101
courseSections.description: Master the fundamentals of rocket design and propulsion systems in this comprehensive introductory course.

courseSections.title: Space Navigation and Orbital Mechanics
courseSections.description: Learn the intricacies of plotting courses through the cosmos and understanding the complex dance of celestial bodies.

courseSections.title: Advanced Materials in Aerospace
courseSections.description: Explore cutting-edge materials and their applications in spacecraft and aircraft construction.

testimonials.quote: The Aerospace Academy opened up a universe of opportunities for me!
testimonials.author: Alex Stargazer

testimonials.quote: I never thought I'd be designing real spacecraft components. Now I am!
testimonials.author: Samantha Cosmos

testimonials.quote: I'm so excited to be a part of this program! I can't wait to learn more about space exploration and aerospace engineering.
testimonials.author: Matthew Johnson
